languages.text: "Это... было бы чудесно! Мое обучение на Эурак-V оборвалось, но я уже поняла, что мудрость книг не всегда способна заменить мудрость жизненного опыта".

traits.locale_text: "Это... было бы чудесно! Мое обучение на Эурак-V оборвалось, но я уже поняла, что мудрость книг не всегда способна заменить мудрость жизненного опыта".
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: "That... would be wonderful! My education on Eurac V was cut short, but I had realised by then that the wisdom of books is a poor substitute for the wisdom of experience."
languages.original_text: "Это... было бы чудесно! Мое обучение на Эурак-V оборвалось, но я уже поняла, что мудрость книг не всегда способна заменить мудрость жизненного опыта".

traits.locale_text: "That... would be wonderful! My education at Eurac-V was cut short, but I already realized the wisdom of books is a poor substitute for the wisdom of experience."
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

traits.locale_text: "That... would be wonderful! My education on Eurac-V was cut short, but I had realised by then that the wisdom of books is a poor substitute for the wisdom of experience."
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

traits.locale_text: "That... would be wonderful! My education on Eurac-V was cut short, but I had realised by then that the wisdom of books is a poor substitute for the wisdom of experience."

traits.locale_text: "That... would be wonderful! My education on Eurac V was cut short, but I had realised by then that the wisdom of books is a poor substitute for the wisdom of experience."
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: “那……那可真是太棒了！我在欧拉克五号星站上的教育被迫暂停，但那时我已经意识到，书本上的智慧只不过是真正人生智慧拙劣的替代品。”
languages.original_text: "That... would be wonderful! My education on Eurac V was cut short, but I had realised by then that the wisdom of books is a poor substitute for the wisdom of experience."

traits.locale_text: “那……那可真是太棒了！我在欧拉克五号星上的教育被迫暂停，但那时我已经意识到，书本上的智慧只不过是真正人生智慧拙劣的替代品。”
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: «Eso... ¡sería maravilloso! Mi educación en Eurac V se vio interrumpida, pero para entonces ya me había dado cuenta de que lo que se aprende leyendo no es comparable a la experiencia».
languages.original_text: "That... would be wonderful! My education on Eurac V was cut short, but I had realised by then that the wisdom of books is a poor substitute for the wisdom of experience."

traits.locale_text: «Eso... ¡sería maravilloso! Mi educación en Eurac-V se vio interrumpida, pero para entonces ya me había dado cuenta de que lo que se aprende leyendo no es comparable a la experiencia».
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: 「それは…素晴らしいことです！ユーラック・Vでのあたくしの教育は打ち切られましたが、そのときには、書物の知恵は経験の代用にはならないことに気づいていました」
languages.original_text: "That... would be wonderful! My education on Eurac V was cut short, but I had realised by then that the wisdom of books is a poor substitute for the wisdom of experience."

traits.locale_text: 「それは…素晴らしいことです！ユーラック・Vでのあたくしの教育は打ち切られましたが、そのときには、書物の知恵は経験の代用にはならないことに気づいていました」
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: "Das ... wäre wunderbar! Meine Ausbildung auf Eurac V war kurz, aber ich hatte bereits erkannt, dass die Weisheit aus Büchern nur ein ärmlicher Ersatz für die Weisheit der Erfahrung ist."
languages.original_text: "That... would be wonderful! My education on Eurac V was cut short, but I had realised by then that the wisdom of books is a poor substitute for the wisdom of experience."

traits.locale_text: "Das ... wäre wunderbar! Meine Ausbildung auf Eurac-V war kurz, aber ich hatte bereits erkannt, dass die Weisheit aus Büchern nur ein ärmlicher Ersatz für die Weisheit der Erfahrung ist."
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: « Ce... Ce serait merveilleux ! Même si je n'ai pas pu finir mes études sur Eurac-V, j'y avais déjà réalisé que la sagesse des livres ne saurait remplacer l'expérience. »
languages.original_text: "That... would be wonderful! My education on Eurac V was cut short, but I had realised by then that the wisdom of books is a poor substitute for the wisdom of experience."

traits.locale_text: « Ce... Ce serait merveilleux ! Même si je n'ai pas pu finir mes études sur Eurac-V, j'y avais déjà réaliser que la sagesse des livres ne saurait remplacer l'expérience. »
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: "Harika olur! Eurac V'teki eğitimim yarım kalmıştı ama orada, kitaplardan edinilen irfanın, deneyimle edinilen irfanın yerini tutmayacağını anlamıştım."
languages.original_text: "That... would be wonderful! My education on Eurac V was cut short, but I had realised by then that the wisdom of books is a poor substitute for the wisdom of experience."

traits.locale_text: "Bu harika olur! Eurac V'teki eğitimim yarım kaldı ama orada, kitaplardan edinilen irfanın, deneyimle edinilen irfanın yerini tutmayacağını anlamıştım."
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion
